title: Competency Enhancement Course in Nursing Simulation and Electronic Medical Record (E-documentation) Practice

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental Nursing Skills and Medical Terminology Proficiency, Basic Computer Literacy
context.additional_context: Practical training for active nurses, reinforcing simulations and formative assessments using academic eMR programs.

learning_goals: Learners can accurately document adult patient observations and nursing notes using an eMR system
Learners can perform real-time documentation while adhering to security and ethical standards in electronic medical records
Learners can apply collaborative procedures via an eMR system during team-based patient case management in a simulation environment

resources: Academic eMR (electronic Medical Record) simulation program license

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
